name: DCEU
description: The cinematic universe that began with Man of Steel (2013) and concluded with Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom (2023), leading into the new DCU.

media.name: Wonder Woman
media.timeline_note: The majority of this film takes place in 1918, making it the chronological starting point for the DCEU's history. The framing story is set in the present day, after 'Batman v Superman'.

media.name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
Justice League
media.timeline_note: Zack Snyder's Justice League (2021) is an alternate, non-canon version of this film.

media.name: Peacemaker
media.timeline_note: This TV series immediately follows the events of 'The Suicide Squad'.

media.name: The Flash
media.timeline_note: The events of this film directly lead to the reboot of the timeline, ending the DCEU and setting the stage for the new DCU.

media.name: Blue Beetle
media.timeline_note: While a DCEU film, the main character is considered the first official character of the new DCU.

relationships.reason: This universe was officially rebooted into the new DCU following the events of 'The Flash'.
